title: U.S. households with clothes dryers in 2009 , by energy source
summary: The statistic illustrates the source households of the U.S. at the dryers 2009 in by 2018 .

The total source households amounted to 71.8 Electric , 1.0 Natural_gas and 1.0 Propane/LPG millions , which resulted in a fifth position on the source table behind Norway , Germany Canada and the country .
All of these millions were won in the category speed skating , including the short-track and the mass start .
gold: The statistic illustrates the number of households with clothes dryers in the United States in 2009 , by energy source . In 2009 , 71.8 million U.S. households owned a electric clothes dryer . As of 2009 , almost 80 percent of U.S. households had a clothes dryer .
